attributes.action: accident and emergency hospital department for the isle of sheppey
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to try and get an accident and emergency department for the Isle of Sheppey Kent. The island has a community hospital however it holds no accident and emergency department. There is an ever going increasing number of residents on the island with the increase of new housing being built however there is inadequete emergency health services readily avilable. This petition calls for the goverment to facilitate an accident and emergency department which in turn can save lives to those in danger.
